first_para: Mary Macleod (born 4 January 1969) is a British Conservative Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Brentford and Isleworth since the 2010 general election. After a career in business consulting, she was a policy advisor to Queen Elizabeth II.

full.extract: Mary Macleod (born 4 January 1969) is a British Conservative Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Brentford and Isleworth since the 2010 general election. After a career in business consulting, she was a policy advisor to Queen Elizabeth II.
full.title: Mary Macleod
